```{r}
# Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(nimble)
library(igraph)
library(coda)
library(R6)
library(gridExtra)

# Read datasets
#
iris.data  <- iris
```

```{r}
a <- iris.data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()

b <- iris.data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Petal.Length, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()

c <- iris.data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Petal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()

d <- iris.data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Petal.Length, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()

e <- iris.data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Petal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()

f <- iris.data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Petal.Length, y = Petal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
grid.arrange(a, b, c, d, e, f, nrow = 3)
```
